author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/uhv0b (compensated affiliate link) - 8BitDo just released a new revision of one of my favorite game controllers. Called the "Pro 3" this new controller is a nice mix of a SNES and Playstation controller. They layered on some new features inside and out to make it more of a premium product vs. the prior edition. See more 8bitdo: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIt2qhI5w4F0TJj9zOkXKABa and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: 8BitDo Pro 3 Game Controller Review - A New Iteration of My Favorite Game Controller
